thread.title: Convenient Cambria in Chelsea
thread.title_full: Convenient Cambria in Chelsea - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ian D
title: Convenient Cambria in Chelsea
text:
I stay in the Chelsea area of NY for business on a regular basis, including other hotels on 28th St. Due to a very busy week in NY and booking last minute, I chose the Cambria for their great price on a room for 2 nights. Here's the highlights -
Booking - $20 extra for a higher floor? Nope, I usually get that by asking at check-in, it's in my guest profile and my hope was I'd get an "upgrade"
Check in- I was early and the front desk clerk said she would try and get me in early. Waited 20 minutes and went back to the desk and she had a room on 12. Not as high as I like, but no worries. I did have to ask about the property, facilities, any highlights, etc. and was disappointed that there wasn't any coffee, snacks, breakfast included. Often I just want a half a cup of coffee mid day or in the evening, but that's my fault, I'll know for next time.
Room- Spacious for the NY area and well appointed, I was very happy with the room, cleanliness, furnishings, etc. Comfortable bed is always a plus.
Overall - this is a very good property for the money, I'd really like a room on a higher floor without paying a premium, a cup of coffee any time of day, and breakfast in the morning, but that's for other properties on 28th. Not sure I'd return unless I reach status with this chain.
